title: controller reset
extract: 1.Turn off the PlayStation 4. 2.Locate the small reset button on the back of the SCUF 4PS near the L2 shoulder button. 3.Use a small, unfolded paper-clip or something similar to push the button (the button is inside a tiny hole). Hold the button down for a couple of seconds and release.Jan 13, 2019
extract_html: 1.Turn off the PlayStation 4. 2.Locate the small reset button on the back of the SCUF 4PS near the L2 shoulder button. 3.Use a small, unfolded paper-clip or something similar to push the button (the button is inside a tiny hole). Hold the button down for a couple of seconds and release.Jan 13, 2019
